name: @randy.tarampi/job-application
description: A utility to generate coherent job application (resume + cover letter) packages.

scripts.build:babel: yarn run build:babel:esm && yarn run build:babel:es5
scripts.build:babel:es5: cross-env-shell BABEL_ENV=client.es5 babel src --out-dir es5 --root-mode upward --copy-files
scripts.build:babel:esm: cross-env-shell BABEL_ENV=client.esm babel src --out-dir esm --root-mode upward --copy-files
scripts.job-application: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=printable CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").name") CAMPAIGN_MEDIUM=pdf CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") gulp -LLLL --color job-application
scripts.job-applications: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=printable CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").name") CAMPAIGN_MEDIUM=pdf CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") gulp -LLLL --color job-applications
scripts.kill:server: if [ -f /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid ]; then echo "Killing server (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid"; kill -9 `cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid`; rm /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid; fi;
scripts.prepare: yarn run snyk-protect && yarn run build
scripts.start:server: yarn run kill:server; node ./server.js & echo $! > /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid; echo "Started server (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid";
